definitions.definition: The holy ninth month of the Islamic lunar calendar , during which Muslims fast between the break of dawn until sunset ; they also refrain from drinking liquids, smoking and having sexual relations .
A male given name from Arabic, of Muslim usage .

main_definition: ( Islam ) The holy ninth month of the Islamic lunar calendar , during which Muslims fast between the break of dawn until sunset ; they also refrain from drinking liquids, smoking and having sexual relations .
secondary_definitions: A male given name from Arabic, of Muslim usage .
